GDR - General Distribution Release
Spring 2014 Update - it is official term.
06|03|2014
-=W.Z.T=-

This is the Spring 2014 update for 8.1 RTM. They were briefly available for download by doing a registry hack, but MS has since taken the 2919355 down. We have verified these MSU files to have the same SHA1 hash.

Enjoy,
murph
